comment._content:
Sarah Vaughan worked with J. C. Heard's orchestra at Café Society Downtown from February 20 until September 8, 1946.

(Goings on about Town: Café Society Downtown," March 2, 1946).
(Goings on about Town: Café Society Downtown," September 7, 1946).
(“Moves To Kelly’s,” Baltimore Afro-American, September 14, 1946, 22).
